description:
Tina decides to buy a ferret, much to the chagrin of Miyabi (who doesn`t want to make more work for Taeko) but Aoi considers the animal incredibly cute.
The ferret escapes confinement and heads straight for Miyabi, stealing her favorite pen and thus causing her to chase the animal all through the house. Finally, Miyabi locks herself into her study and refuses to answer anyone.
